Hello, and welcome to my site!

I'm Cody Tuttle. I'm a researcher and data scientist. I spend my days as a research scientist at Minnesota Management and Budget, where I specialize in impact evaluation, human services, and social policy. I love data science and visualization, R, running, my wife and daughter, and a lot of other things.
